```{r, include=FALSE}
# clear environment
rm(list = ls())

# load packages
library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)
library(glmnet)
library(doParallel)
```

```{r}
# load in train and test
obp_train <- read.csv('./project/volume/data/interim/obp_train_1.csv',
                      stringsAsFactors = TRUE)
obp_train <- as_tibble(obp_train)

obp_test <- read.csv('./project/volume/data/interim/obp_test_1.csv', 
                     stringsAsFactors = TRUE)
obp_test <- as_tibble(obp_test)
```

```{r}
# create model specification
obp_lr_spec <- linear_reg(penalty = tune(),
                          mixture = tune()) %>%
                set_mode("regression") %>%
                set_engine("glmnet")
obp_lr_spec

#args(linear_reg)
```

```{r}
# create model recipe to preprocess data
obp_lr_rec <- recipe(FullSeason_OBP ~ ., data = obp_train) %>%
              update_role(playerid, Name, Team, new_role = "ID") %>%
              step_normalize(all_predictors())
obp_lr_rec
```

```{r}
# create regular grid of values for tuning
obp_lr_grid <- grid_regular(penalty(),
                            mixture(),
                            levels = 20)
obp_lr_grid
```

```{r}
# view values in grid
obp_lr_grid %>% count(mixture) # change hyperparameter to view its tested values
```

```{r}
set.seed(2008)

# create cross-validation folds
obp_folds <- vfold_cv(obp_train, v = 10)
glimpse(obp_folds)
```

```{r}
# create workflow and tune along grid
all_cores <- parallel::detectCores()
cl <- makePSOCKcluster(all_cores)
registerDoParallel(cl)

set.seed(2008)

obp_lr_wf <- workflow() %>%
             add_model(obp_lr_spec) %>%
             add_recipe(obp_lr_rec)

obp_lr_res <- obp_lr_wf %>%
               tune_grid(resamples = obp_folds,
                         grid = obp_lr_grid,
                         control = control_grid(save_pred = TRUE,
                                                save_workflow = TRUE),
                         metrics = metric_set(rmse, mae))

stopCluster(cl)
```

```{r}
# collect cv results
saveRDS(obp_lr_res, './project/volume/models/obp_lr_res_1.rds')

#obp_gbt_res %>% collect_predictions()
obp_lr_res %>% collect_metrics()
obp_lr_res %>% show_best("rmse")
```

```{r}
# select best hyperparameters
obp_best_lr <- obp_lr_res %>%
               select_best("rmse")
obp_best_lr
```

```{r}
obp_lr_metric <- obp_lr_res %>% collect_metrics()
obp_lr_metric[obp_lr_metric$.config == 'Preprocessor1_Model215',]
```

```{r}
# record results for final model selection
obp_lr_rmse <- 0.02849681
saveRDS(obp_lr_rmse, './project/volume/data/processed//obp_lr_rmse_1.rds')
obp_lr_mae <- 0.02303054
saveRDS(obp_lr_mae, './project/volume/data/processed/obp_lr_mae_1.rds')
```
